description: Kokatat's GORE-TEX® Paclite® Pullover with a mid-length front zipper and rollaway hood offers lightweight, waterproof, breathable protection with a competition cut design that mirrors paddler's motions. Adjustable, gusseted coated Lycra® inner splash collar and cuffs make it a perfect piece when wind or wet weather are in the forecast.
name: Kokatat GTX Pullover - Mens
